verbs.description: as [ARG1: clocks] [V: fall] [ARGM-DIR: back] so do temperatures friday evening severe weather was kicked off as a contrast between the unseasonably humid warm weather and the much cooler and less humid weather that preceded and followed respectively the strong cold front now well off to the south and east
